rewrite1:
Please proceed with the following formatting adjustments:

In the seventh paragraph:
- Implement a Level 1 Outline style.
- Strip away all bold styling.
- Change the font to Times New Roman.
- Insert an 8-point space following the paragraph.

In the fifth paragraph:
- Switch the font to Arial.
- Adjust the paragraph to a 1 character Hanging indent.
- Set the font size to 10.5 points.
- Format the text to appear in italics.

For the fifth paragraph, change the font to Arial, apply a 1-character Hanging indent, set the font size to 10.5 points, and italicize the text.
